H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3547.def: = state in which humans have been {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to function as a {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H8549.def: = state in which an object is fully, unaffected and undiminished in its shape and form

H4682.def: = thin cracker-like bread made without yeast

H3899.def: = a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

H2471.def: = type of {L:bread<SDBH:לֶחֶם>}, shaped like a ring, ◄ made out of {L:fine flour<SDBH:סֹלֶת>} and other ingredients by {L:baking<SDBH:אפה>} it in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}; ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (usually unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites; ≈ regarded as high quality bread

H1101.def: = causative action by which people combine different ingredients into one single mass; ≈ sometimes associated with confusion

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H7550.def: = flat type of {L:bread<SDBH:לֶחֶם>}, ◄ made out of {L:flour<SDBH:סֹלֶת>} and other ingredients by {L:baking<SDBH:אפה>} it in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}; ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites

H4886.def: = causative action by which humans apply a liquid like oil or paint to an object by pouring or rubbing ► for the purpose of cleaning, preserving, beautifying, eating, or for consecrating for religious service

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2406.def: = cereal plant bearing dense four-sided spike of grain; ◄ Triticum; ► important source of flour for bread; ≈ its color used to be regarded as the ideal color for the skin

H5560.def: = finely ground flour ◄ from only the inner kernel of the wheat, resulting in a high quality flour

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H5536.def: = container ◄ made woven material such as grass or reeds; ► used for storing and/or carrying objects, such as food

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H7364.def: = causative action by which humans or animals wash (part of) their own body or someone else's body or another object, usually with water, ► in order to remove any dirt; ≈ the resulting cleanness often symbolizes ritual cleanness, innocence, or even holiness

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H3847.def: = state in which humans wear certain clothes, often for a specific purpose

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H3801.def: = an undergarment, ◄ woven of linen, ► and worn by the High Priest and his fellow priests; it was worn over the {L:breeches<SDBH:מִכְנָס>}, but from the waist up it was next to the skin; it was a kind of shirt and probably had long sleeves and reached nearly to the ankles and was held in place by a sash wound around the waist.

H4598.def: = long garment, hanging down to the ankles, ◄ usually made of wool, ► and worn over the {L:tunic<SDBH:כֻּתֹּנֶת>}; it is not clear whether it had sleeves or not, nor whether it was open or closed in the front; ≈ certain attitudes and emotions are often described in terms of such a garment, e.g. "he wore fury like a robe"

H646.def: = garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, but also by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

H2833.def: = kind of pouch; square; decorated with 12 precious stones, engraved with the names of the twelve tribes of Israel; ◄ made of cloth; ► worn by the high priest on his chest, on top of the ephod, and containing the urim and thummim

H640.def: = to tie something around someone's waist

H2805.def: = long, thin strip of material, worn around the waist; ◄ made out of cloth; ► worn around the waist (outside of one's clothing)

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H4701.def: = a headpiece formed by winding a long piece of cloth many times around the top of the head; it may have been wound permanently and put on and taken off like a hat; ► worn by priests, but also by kings

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H5145.def: = state in which humans have been set apart for the service of God

H2296.def: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H73.def: = strip ◄ of cloth ► worn around the waist as part of one's uniform

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H2280.def: = state in which something has been wrapped around part of someone's body

H4021.def: = a headpiece formed by winding a long piece of cloth many times around the top of the head; it may have been wound permanently and put on and taken off like a hat; ► worn by priests

H3550.def: = a role in which humans, through a process of {L:ordination<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecration<SDBH:קדשׁ>}, are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H2708.def: = patterns of behavior that a community expects its members to follow

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H676.def: = one of the five long and slender projections of the human hand; ► used for writing, pointing, grasping, and other activities; ≈ sometimes used metonymically to represent the entire body

H3247.def: = the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2459.def: = fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

H3680.def: = state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

H3508.def: exact meaning unsure: = either: lobe in the shape of a finger, projecting from the liver; or: the fat covering the liver or the pancreas ({A:ABD}); ► this was to be burned on the altar as sacrifice to YHWH

H3516.def: = state in which an object has relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H3629.def: = either of a pair of relatively small organs in the abdominal cavity of humans and animals; ≈ regarded as a delicacy and usually burned along with the fat of an animal sacrifice on the altar; considered the seat of emotions and one's devotion to God; in its literal sense only used for animals

H8313.def: = process by which an object is consumed by fire

H784.def: = state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H5785.def: = the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal

H6569.def: = contents of the intestines; ≈ considered unclean

H2351.def: = referent to the location outside of an object

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H5207.def: literally: giving rest; hence: = causative process by which something causes a deity's anger to subside and make place for a favorable attitude

H7381.def: = a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H5137.def: = process by which drops or small quantities of a liquid fall on object

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H899.def: = piece of cloth used to cover an object

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H2459.def: = fat parts ◄ of the body of animals and human beings; ► often the main ingredient of a sacrifice; ≈ regarded as the best part of the meat, but also associated with unresponsiveness and stubbornness

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H451.def: = hindmost part of a sheep, which contains a relatively large quantity of fat, ► which was to be sacrificed to God

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3680.def: = state or process by which a surface is covered by another object, ► often making this surface more or less invisible

H3508.def: exact meaning unsure: = either: lobe in the shape of a finger, projecting from the liver; or: the fat covering the liver or the pancreas ({A:ABD}); ► this was to be burned on the altar as sacrifice to YHWH

H3516.def: = state in which an object has relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H3629.def: = either of a pair of relatively small organs in the abdominal cavity of humans and animals; ≈ regarded as a delicacy and usually burned along with the fat of an animal sacrifice on the altar; considered the seat of emotions and one's devotion to God; in its literal sense only used for animals

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3225.def: = the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H2471.def: = type of {L:bread<SDBH:לֶחֶם>}, shaped like a ring, ◄ made out of {L:fine flour<SDBH:סֹלֶת>} and other ingredients by {L:baking<SDBH:אפה>} it in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}; ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (usually unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites; ≈ regarded as high quality bread

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H7550.def: = flat type of {L:bread<SDBH:לֶחֶם>}, ◄ made out of {L:flour<SDBH:סֹלֶת>} and other ingredients by {L:baking<SDBH:אפה>} it in an {L:oven<SDBH:תַּנּוּר>}; ► used as food, also sacrificed to God (unleavened) and then eaten by priests and Levites

H5536.def: = container ◄ made woven material such as grass or reeds; ► used for storing and/or carrying objects, such as food

H4682.def: = thin cracker-like bread made without yeast

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H7243.def: = state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H8145.def: = state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

H3532.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H6153.def: = the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H5262.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ made by pouring molten metal into a mold; ► functions as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H5207.def: literally: giving rest; hence: = causative process by which something causes a deity's anger to subside and make place for a favorable attitude

H7381.def: = a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

H801.def: = action by which humans offer something to a deity by burning it partially or in its entirety on the altar; considered to have a pleasing aroma

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3259.def: = process by which an object is placed in a certain location or in a certain posture

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3259.def: = process by which an object is placed in a certain location or in a certain posture

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H6942.def: = action by which humans that are part of a {L:holy<SDBH:קָדֹושׁ>} nation set themselves apart from others by not engaging in activities that are not in accordance with God's law

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H4196.def: = construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H3547.def: = state in which humans have been {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to function as a {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation
